definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.chinese: 安卓系统也有类似的功能。

sentences.english: Listen, Adrienne , you can't tell Chandler about this.
sentences.chinese: 听着，安卓，你可不能告诉钱德。

sentences.english: Android has now blasted past iOS in the smartphone platform market.
sentences.chinese: 安卓在智能手机平台市场已经超越了iOS系统。

sentences.english: The lion stood quite still, and rubbed his head against the man's shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 狮子很安静地站在那儿，用头蹭着安卓可利斯和肩膀。

sentences.english: A very useful feature of Android is the hidden menu structure.
sentences.chinese: 安卓一个非常有效的特性就是隐藏菜单结构。

sentences.english: There are 550, 000 new Android devices everyday.
sentences.chinese: 事实上现在世界上每天都新增55万台安卓设备。

sentences.english: Android developers became frustrated that they couldn't monetize very well on Android.
sentences.chinese: 安卓开发者变得绝望，没法在安卓上很好赚钱。

sentences.english: Google’s free navigation app is a big advantage for Android.
sentences.chinese: 安卓系统的一大优势便是谷歌的免费导航应用。

sentences.english: Forget the criticism about not making money with Android.
sentences.chinese: 不要再对谷歌未能利用安卓吸金而横加指责。

sentences.english: While this is an application platform game in Andrews.
sentences.chinese: 同时这是一个应用在安卓平台上的游戏。

sentences.english: Honeycomb is Android's first tablet-optimized software release.
sentences.chinese: 蜂窝是安卓的第一款桌面优化软件。

sentences.english: The newest Android phones can be unlocked by showing them your face.
sentences.chinese: 最新的安卓手机支持面部识别解锁。

sentences.english: I would recommend that you spend more time getting familiar with Android first.
sentences.chinese: 我建议你多花点时间熟悉安卓第一。

sentences.english: Next-gen Android tablets, nothing shipping yet, and so, I don't know.
sentences.chinese: 下一代安卓平板电脑，还没有售出，所以我不知道。

sentences.english: Google's deep cash resources should strengthen Android's legal defenses.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌的雄厚资金应该能够增强安卓的合法抗辩能力。

sentences.english: A new Android application will follow soon.
sentences.chinese: 新的安卓应用程序也将很快推出。

definition: three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
Google, Internet company and search engine
